summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Judicial Nominating Commission of Dallas, Texas, will convene on April 25, 2024, at 6:00 PM. This meeting will be conducted via videoconference and in-person at City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street. The primary purpose is to interview candidates for the positions of Municipal Judges, including the Administrative Judge and Associate Judge.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the previous meeting (April 16, 2024).
2. Executive session to interview candidates for the Municipal Judges' positions, in accordance with Texas Open Meetings Act provisions.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a closed executive session to deliberate on the appointment and employment of the judges. This session is protected under Section 551.074 of the Texas Government Code, allowing for confidential discussions regarding personnel matters.

**Action Items**:  
The commission will seek approval of the minutes from the previous meeting and will make decisions regarding the appointment of candidates for the Municipal Judges' positions. No specific proposals or budget items are listed for this meeting, focusing primarily on candidate interviews. 

The meeting will also reiterate prohibitions on firearms in the meeting space, ensuring compliance with state laws regarding concealed and openly carried weapons.
